verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Glory, glory to the Father. Glory, glory to the Son. Glory, glory to the Spirit. Glory to the Three, the One.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Praise the Father who has purposed Praise the Son who all has done Praise the Spirit who is working Praise the Three who work as one.{/lang-eng}
